actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution providing for the House of Representatives to determine with specific Guidelines what constitutes an official expense prior to the $5,000 increase of a Member's official expenses allowance.

summary.text: Stipulates that the $5,000 increase in the official expenses allowance for Members of the House of Representatives shall not take effect until the House of Representatives adopts a resolution determining specific guidelines for what constitutes an official expense.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the House of Representatives to determine with specific Guidelines what constitutes an official expense prior to the $5,000 increase of a Member's official expenses allowance.
